attributes.action: Review the tax paid for working more then one job..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why pay basic rate tax for second/third jobs? Why punish hard workers who have a need to work to earn money, only to be taxed more at a higher rate on their second job. NI numbers could be used to pay the same tax no matter how many jobs you have.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
